title: via Taranto columbaria
description: Two Roman columbaria are located under the present via Pescara, 2. This accounts for the tomb being referred to interchangeably with two modern, street-derived toponyms, namely "via Taranto" and "via Pescara". These tombs are situated near the ancient crossroads of the via Latina and the via Labicana.

properties.title: OSM location of Colombari di via Taranto
